metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of the draft for $500 credited to Luk Shin Cho's account. Since funds had been exhausted and a temporary loan was issued to cover expenses, Stearns has had to arrange for a temporary loan. The amount of $500 will not last for long, so he will be requesting more remittances soon. He states that Luk is at summer school at Dummer Academy, to enable him to do the elementary work required before he returns to Andover. Reports from Dummer indicate that Luk is making excellent progress.
